panels.description: Average cluster load for the last minute
panels.title: Load (1M)

panels.description: Average cluster load for the last five minute
panels.title: Load (5M)

panels.description: Average cluster load for the last fifteen minute
panels.title: Load (15M)

panels.description: Cluster used root filesystem percentage as a whole
panels.title: Root FS Used

panels.description: Cluster total root filesystem size as a whole
panels.title: Root FS Total

panels.description: Total number of containers running on the cluster.
panels.title: Containers

panels.description: Cluster memory usage. This includes reclaimable cache and buffers usage
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Cluster average write wait time. Write latency
panels.title: Average Write Wait Time

panels.description: Cluster average read wait time. Read latency
panels.title: Average Read Wait Time

panels.description: cluster average queue length of the requests
panels.title: Average Queue Size

panels.description: Cluster packets dropped by softnet. Dropped packets are an indicator the kernel could not keep up with the network load.
panels.title: Softnet Packets Dropped

panels.description: Cluster squeezed packets by softnet. An increase of squeezed counters indicate the CPU had to interrupt processing the network packets due to time budget constraints, network packet processing is falling behind.
panels.title: Softnet Squeezed

panels.description: Cluster ARP entries. Mapping of IP addresses to MAC addresses.
panels.title: ARP Entries
